title: Bloomberg Markets: Infrastructure Investment in Puerto Rico
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Infrastructure Investment in Puerto Rico
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Ricardo Alvarez-Diaz\u0010Principal\u0010Alvarez-Diaz & Villalon\u0010Discussing the current state of Puerto Rico and the outlook for doing business on the island following the devastation of Hurricanes Irma and Maria.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
